meanings.definition: A small Spanish coin worth half a real.
meanings.sent1: I found a pistareen in the old treasure chest.
meanings.sent2: He paid a pistareen for the delicious pastry.
meanings.sent3: The pirate thought the pistareen was a treasure map marker.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a pistareen in the sea of frowns.
meanings.sent5: The pistareen glinted in the sunlight, catching my eye.

meanings.sent1: She offered a pistareen for the rare book.
meanings.sent2: He didn't care about a pistareen, only wanting to help.
meanings.sent3: The pistareen he gave me was actually chocolate!
meanings.sent4: Time with her was worth more than any pistareen.
meanings.sent5: The pistareen slipped through his fingers, lost in the crowd.
